mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.dimension_id AS "dimension.id", d.name AS "dimension.name", a.measure_id AS "measure.id", m.name AS "measure.name", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.weight AS "weight", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.category AS "category.id", c.name AS "category.name"
LEFT JOIN mod_measure m ON m.id = a.measure_id LEFT JOIN mod_item_category c ON c.id = a.category LEFT JOIN mod_item_dimension d ON d.id = a.dimension_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO int_item_dimension_measure( id, dimension_id, measure_id, name, description, weight, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, category ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dimension.id}, #{measure.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{weight}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{category.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE int_item_dimension_measure SET dimension_id = #{dimension.id}, measure_id = #{measure.id}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, weight = #{weight}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, category = #{category.id} WHERE id = #{id}
